channel.title: Need help with your server?
channel.description:
hello,
i am just posting this because i wanna help people with their rsps i can code [pi] 317 so if you're having any problems with that message me on here and i'll get back to you
SOME things i can help you with - adding or removing shops - changing you client into a single .jar file - auto cache downloader - changing ip - the 100 error problem when complying - adding tele ports - adding commands and alot more so if you need help just drop me a message on here

item.title: Need help with your server?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

There are tons of people looking for help in the very section you’re posting this topic in, who woulda guessed?! People generally come here to post their problems so it wouldn’t make sense having a topic where people post their problems for you to reply, that’s some sort of ‘server helpseption.’ But we really do appreciate your help and consideration to aid the community.

If you’re having a bit of trouble understanding the rules or just have questions about them, you can message me. The section rules are posted above by sk8rdude461 as well as the Global rules that apply to the whole forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with your server?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This isn’t how the help section works. I say that because I could almost guarantee your “help” would be them paying you to do it.

Everything you listed can be done via tutorial.

And fixing that “100 error problem” all you need is an IDE.

You should take a look at the Section Rules along with the Global rules before posting.

Read full topic
